reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The main reason we felt compelled to write this review is because we want to warn people who are planning on heading off to bed before midnight that there are plenty of rooms that will be affected by loud music noise from the function rooms. If, as in our case, the hotel is full you will just have to put up with objects moving around the room due to the bass. Supposedly it's mentioned in the small print of your booking confirmation so double check especially if you have young children like us.
reviews.title: The Gables was perfect for our needs

reviews.text: We decided to get married in Gretna Green after hours of research on-line. We are British but live in France most of the time, Gretna appeared to be a perfect solution for our marriage. Straightforward and simple. I used Trip advisor a lot to help me choose a hotel, as in France and unable to visit the hotels and make a decision. We decided to get married on a Monday as we felt it would be less like a conveyor belt, and we were right.
reviews.title: Fantastic wedding day to remember!!

reviews.text: We were very specific with our requirements as we had small group (14) and wanted it to be very special. The Gables was a great choice. Our room (one of the bridal suites) was very well furnished wih four poster bed and ensuite bathroom complete with a seperate shower and jacuzzi bath. There was no view to talk of (other than a campsite and the motorway in the distance)but we weren't there for the view! Our guests rooms were clean and spacious. The only problem we had with the rooms was that they were too hot, and we were unable to control the temperature. We had to open our window and then we had the noise from the motorway in the distance. The food in the bar the day prior to our wedding day was ok. Our meal after the wedding was amazing. It was a fantastic sunny day, we had drinks and nibbles in the garden, then they took our orders for our a la carte meal. The meal was excellent , and way above our expectations. The staff were very polite and helpful, it was a little worrying that the wedding co-ordinator had her day off the day of the wedding. We did have to repeat requests to the stand in due to poor note taking/communications. But the day ran smoothly and overall it was a fantastic day to remember. We would highly recommend the Gables to any future wedding parties.
reviews.title: Very nice stay - excellent staff

reviews.text: We got married on the 15th Aug 2007 and stayed at the Gables for 2 nights. Everything about the stay and the wedding reception was fantastic. The staff could not be more helpful, and very polite. We could not fault the food. All in all it was the most perfect day, made possible by the help of all of the staff.
reviews.title: Gables Hotel Wedding reception and stay)

likes.liked: — The family room was spacious and very clean and tidy

description: The Gables is an independent, family owned hotel in the heart of Gretna. This beautiful, grade-II listed Property is steeped in history and has become one of the leading wedding venue hotels in Gretna.From the moment you arrive to the moment you leave, you are assured of a warm, friendly atmosphere where nothing is too much trouble.The Hotels restaurant has earned a reputation for fine, traditional Scottish food, offering the ideal setting to enjoy a relaxing meal with friends and family, boasting a full & varied A La Carte menu complemented by a carefully selected wine list. For those who prefer a less formal setting, our cosy lounge bar offers delicious home cooked bar meals including many traditional favourites. Offering Free Wi-Fi and ample free onsite parking, The Gables Hotel is conveniently situated only a mile from the M(A)74, M6 & A75 giving easy access to Glasgow, Dumfries & Carlisle. Perfect for exploring the colourful heritage of Gretna Green and designer shopping at The Gretna Gateway Outlet village is just minutes away.
